title: T205 AB backs from REA lot 439
author: kmac32

posts.post_title: T205 AB backs from REA lot 439
posts.post_content:
Evening,

I won consignment 439 from REA a few weeks ago and have finally evaluated the group of 31 cards.  Have sold off a few (Gibson, Chase, Hoblitzell and Wilson), plan on keeping the Cubs as upgrades and will be selling off the Cubs dupes at a later point.  The remaining cards are available for sale and will be taking/ negotiating offers.  If You have a reasonable deal in mind, ask.  The worst I can say is no and give you a counteroffer.

PM me or contact me at [url]Cubkmac32@aol.com[/url] with inquiries.  Payment via paypal f/f please.  Thanks for looking.
Ken

Current cards available all T205 AB backs in order of rarity

Robert Ewing
Charles Street
David Shean
George Schlei
Edward Konetchy
Frank Corridon
Robert Byrne
Russell Blackburne
James Austin
Thomas Leach
John Bates

Another wave will appear after the Cubbies are back from SGC.  Can send pics if you send a phone to text to or email to.  Feel free to make reasonable offers.

I will take Chase.Thank you

when payment of m.o received , please send to my work address as follows:

Havel Flooring
c/o Dan Koteles
6684 Dixie Hwy ste#b
Clarkston Michigan 48346

Bought it today and the funds will go out tomorrow Saturday by noon.

Thank you Ken and I am still pondering others
Bump to update available cards and listing.
Bump to make list of remaining available cards.
